transcript: Customer: Hello\nExecutive: Hello very good evening sir I am speaking with Mr. Ramesh. Yeah. Hi sir this side Reena calling from IndiaMART head office from customer care. Yeah. Actually you have a raised concern to move your services in Bangaluru right? Yes. So I just wanted to know from you ki abhi aapko agar sir Santosh ne ye bola hai ki services hum Bangaluru mein de sakte hain because Santosh ne yahan approval mail dala but hamare yahan se as per the process approval nahi mila right? To wahan pe hum aapke sir reason kya hai na wahan pe serviceable code nahi hai reason ye hai. Service aap Santosh se puchh lo. mera aap near to Bangaluru hai theek hai. Agree sir agree discussion karna hai verification karna hai to we are able for that na we are able sir. No no no main main nahi hai idhar mera office ko Hindi English nahi aata hai wo Kannada local Kannada wala chahiye. Theek hai wo jana padega wo discussion karna karna padega suno idhar main aap shift kiya to main TrustSeal mein main star category mein leta hu. So you can sir aap star to service yahan se bhi le sakte ho na product to same hi hai hum to head office local aadmi chahiye madam. Sir but the thing is na hona chahiye. ha agar aap ek kam ye suno mera baat suno abhi do saal mein aap maintain kiya hai na main kuch baat nahi kiya theek hai abhi mere ko extend karna hai thoda bada karna hai isliye sir agreed agreed agree sir lekin please try to understand you transfer why we cannot we cannot transfer your catalog because there are no serviceable code sir as per this wahan pe aap samjho na sir as per the policy hum aapka catalog wahan transfer nahi kar sakte we don't have any service provider. No no no I want immediate transfer if it is possible you can do you can do one thing if it's not possible then say no I know what to do next. Sir you can do one thing aap apne GST mein na Bangaluru wala address update kar do aur second cheez aap ek kam ye karo hota hai madam Bangaluru ka address kaisa hota hai aap GST mein update karo GST ka address hamara 100 kilometer aaju baju mein hai wo to wo possible nahi hai aap ye keh rahe ho to aap fir ek kam ye karo sir Santosh ko aap ye bolo ki wo written mein aapko ek mail likh kar de de ki wo aapki service ko wahan transfer karwa sakta hai wo nahi dega sir aap puchh lo agar he agree to give you written mail theek hai sir hum dekhte hain is pe kya karna hai sir agar wo aapko written mein deta hai to aap puchho wo written mein mail dega aapko ki aapki service wahan pe transfer ho sakti hai wo transfer karne ke liye kyu aisa pura kya hai sir as per the policy kya bol rahe nahi nahi wo ek khali transfer karne ke liye hamara paisa hamara hamara kam hai hamara dam hai kyu aisa document sir if there are sir product to same hai na sir product agar aapko product chahiye main customer sir you listen to me now you listen to me now aapko product chahiye na sir wo to head office mein bhi hum denge service bhi aapko hum de rahe hain we never deny ki hum aapko services provide nahi karenge aap yahan to samjho na ki product jo aap star ka lene ka plan karo wo to aap yahan se bhi le sakte ho na sir aur please agar mere ko monthly discussion karne ke liye mere ko local aadmi we are available between 9 to 6 pm over the video meet sir don't worry we are available madam wo Bangaluru ka Karnataka ka Kannada wala Karnataka language chahiye mere ko sir if there are problems if there are problem in language barriers to to you can do one thing please hire this staff who knows the English sir chalo theek hai we know ki Hindi mein problem hogi but aapke pass aise bhi to employee honge na jo English jinko aati hogi sir we can communicate with them in English madam aap ek bar bolte hain baad mein aisa nahi hota who said sir who said no no no nahi nahi nahi listen did anyone committed did anyone given the commitment to move your catalog in Bangaluru sir did anyone commitment please let us I finish then after you will sir you sir let me let me tell you aap bar bar 9696 pe call karoge agar possibility hoti to hum first time hi aapka catalog transfer kara dete as per the process ye possible nahi hai ki aapke catalog hum Bangaluru mein move karwa sake because do saal aapki service already head office mein chadh chuki hai to nahi possible hai aap Santosh se puchh lo na sir agar possible hai to wo written mein mail karke de aapko ki ha wahan pe aapka catalog ji listen ek minute main card conference card dalta hu aap sir I don't want to discuss with Santosh na because we have communicated with them multiple times don't want discuss with you madam I want to I want to one more sir why we discuss why we need to discuss with Santosh he already knows all the process sir he already know all the process sir hello hello sir madam main kitna baat kiya to main mind change nahi hota hai suno idhar sir but there is aap kar nahi sakte to chhod do main main consumer court ko main jata hu main kya karne gaya hu main karta hu chhod do you can do anything nimma kariyannu hold nalli irisiddare dayavittu
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to transfer services to Bangalore.

- Wants local support in Kannada.



Resolution:

- Executive stated serviceable codes not available in Bangalore.

- Suggested updating GST with Bangalore address.

- Suggested getting written confirmation from Santosh.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to ask Santosh for written confirmation.



Alert (If Any):

- complaint



@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- transfer, serviceable codes, gst, local support, bangalore
